title: 2nd Place (₩2,000,000)
organization: Korea University College of Informatics NE:XT Software Contest
description: A contest hosted by the College of Informatics at Korea University. Led the development of AI services for the dating assistant app Rendi.

title: Honourable Mention (₩300,000)
organization: Digital Competition of the Nat’l Program of Excellence in Software
description: A competition hosted by the Ministry of Science&ICT. Developed an OOD classification model for detecting fake audio.

title: NIA Director's Award (₩3,000,000)
description: A competition hosted by the Ministry of Science&ICT and the National Information Society Agency. Developed a Korean speech recognition model tailored for the elderly and children.

title: President’s List
description: An award given to an undergraduate student with GPA 4.5/4.5 for two consecutive semesters.

title: President’s List
description: An award given to an undergraduate student with GPA 4.5/4.5 for two consecutive semesters.

title: Dean’s List
description: An award given to an undergraduate student with GPA 4.5/4.5 for a semester.
